name: The Egg Thief
description:
A game made by Roberto Romao for the Newgrounds July Game jam!

WASD to control and J to interact!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Music's

Desert Caravan by Aaron Kenny

Two sides of the Truth and VFX by YouFulca

https://wingless-seraph.net

----------------------------------------------------------------

Realm of Mustafa 

Year 35 after the veil of Darkness

A young thief walk in the sewers reading toward the 

royal palace, in a quest to find and steal the Golden Egg

a powerfull power source left behind by Mustafa himself, 

the one who brough Enlightment and Wisdom.
